price: 24. Argi jie giliai nepagalvoja to, kas yra Korane? Ar jų širdys yra užrakintos (nuo jo supratimo)?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna am ʿalā qulūbin aqfāluhā
